Key Match Events: The Yankees won the game 4-3 in 11 innings
Pre-Game Insights: Aaron Judge is in the middle of a 15-game homerless drought
Boone remains optimistic despite the dip in form
Judge has faced and overcome slumps before
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge said 'It's just baseball' when asked about his slump
Boone said 'It's just hitting' and that Judge is still putting together a historic season
Miscellaneous Highlights: Aaron Judge has a 9.5 WAR, compared to Witt's 9.1
The Yankees have dropped eight of their last 14 games
Others: The Yankees are fighting to secure their postseason position
The AL East title is still within reach
